messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI-Long-CLIP?
ComfyUI-Long-CLIP provides a ComfyUI implementation for Long-CLIP, enabling the use of the Long-CLIP model in the SeaArtLongClip module.
Which model versions does ComfyUI-Long-CLIP support for Long-CLIP replacement?
ComfyUI-Long-CLIP supports replacing the clip-l in SD1.5 and provides a process for SDXL models.
How does replacing the clip in SD1.5 with Long-CLIP affect the model?
Replacing the clip in SD1.5 with Long-CLIP increases the token length from 77 to 248, which is expected to improve the quality of the generated images after testing.
How is Long-CLIP handled for SDXL models?
For SDXL models, the clip-g's clip-long model is not available yet. Therefore, the token length is extended in multiples of the max_len, and any excess pad tokens are trimmed.
What can users expect when using Long-CLIP with SDXL?
With Long-CLIP in SDXL, users can expect to see more details in the generated images due to the increased emphasis on clip-g's features.
Where can users download the LongCLIP-L model for ComfyUI-Long-CLIP?
Users can download the LongCLIP-L model from the provided link on Hugging Face and save it in the models/checkpoints directory.
How can users contribute to the development of ComfyUI-Long-CLIP?
Users can contribute to ComfyUI-Long-CLIP by downloading the repository from the provided Git links, and supporting the project by giving it a thumbs up.
Will ComfyUI-Long-CLIP support Long-CLIP-G in the future?
Yes, once the weights for Long-CLIP-G are released, ComfyUI-Long-CLIP will support this model version.
What is ComfyUI-Long-CLIP used for?
ComfyUI-Long-CLIP is used to replace the original clip in ComfyUI for long-term content detection. It expands the token length from 77 to 248, improving the quality of generated images.
How does SeaArtLongClip module work with SD1.5?
The SeaArtLongClip module can be used to replace the original clip in the SD1.5 model, increasing the token length from 77 to 248.
How is ComfyUI-Long-CLIP implemented for the SDXL model?
For the SDXL model, smaller tokens are expanded by an integer multiple of the original max_len. Since the last added tokens are pad_tokens, the excess part is trimmed.
How does ComfyUI-Long-CLIP affect the SDXL model?
Since the clip-g features occupy a larger proportion in SDXL, the images generated may appear more detailed.
How is ComfyUI-Long-CLIP installed?
ComfyUI-Long-CLIP is installed by cloning the ComfyUI repository and the ComfyUI-Long-CLIP repository into the custom_nodes folder.
Where can I find the LongCLIP-L model?
The LongCLIP-L model can be downloaded from Hugging Face and placed in the models/checkpoints directory.
Will ComfyUI-Long-CLIP support LongCLIP-G?
Yes, once the LongCLIP-G weights are released, ComfyUI-Long-CLIP will support them.
Does ComfyUI-Long-CLIP provide examples?
Yes, ComfyUI-Long-CLIP provides specific examples for SD1.5 and SDXL, and these examples do not require any additional plugin installations.
Does ComfyUI-Long-CLIP support clip-skip operations?
Yes, ComfyUI-Long-CLIP supports operations such as clip-skip.
